General.Name: Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of edible fungi in China. It offers mushrooms under the Xihuang, Nuwa, Xuebai, and Junfu brands. The company was formerly known as Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Ltd. and changed its name to Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. in March 2012. Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tianshui, China.
General.Address: Tianshui National Agricultural Science &, Tianshui, China, 741030
